compute_hessian(x, target, nnj_module)¶

compute Jacobian sandwich of the identity for each element in the batch H = identity matrix (None is interpreted as identity by jTmjp)

  • target (Tensor) –

class pytorch_laplace.ContrastiveHessianCalculator(method, *args, **kwargs)¶

Contrastive Loss

L(x,y) = 0.5 * || x - y || Contrastive(x, tuples) = sum_positives L(x,y) - sum_negatives L(x,y)

Notice that the contrastive loss value is the same for

self.method == “full”

and

self.method == “fix”

Parameters:

method (Literal['full', 'fix', 'pos']) –

compute_loss(x, target, nnj_module, tuple_indices)¶

Compute contrastive loss

L_{con} = 0.5 * || x - y ||^2

Parameters:

  • x (Tensor) –

  • target (Tensor) –

  • nnj_module (Sequential) –

  • tuple_indices (Tuple) –

Return type:

Tensor
